caption.title: R codes and data file for modeling sexual transmission of Ebola virus disease.
caption.p: Sierra Leone incidence data. As reported by the World Health Organization on their Ebola outbreak data web page. Parameter Estimation (SEIR). Implementing deterministic EVD models (SEIR, SEICR). Implementing sensitivity analysis. Implementing Monte Carlo simulations of EVD models. Summary statistics of Monte Carlo simulations.
Click here for additional data file.
